page.title: 08A Pig Farm
page.content: There are a number of pig farms in the area.Pig farming is profitable because large quantities of grain are grown on wold farms.Mr C owns a large farm of 2,200 pigs.He employs three men who work eight hours a day.At the weekend two men work a seven hour day. The pigs spend their entire lives in covered pig units.They are fed on a compound ration purchased from Feedex and Bibby. Mr C buys boars from pig companies such as Newsham Hybrids of Malton. His pigs are troubled with respiratory complaints such as pneumonia and colds.He sells his pigs to a firm called Feedex who process them for pork and cutter.
